bit.title: Übungen regelmäßige und unregelmäßige Verben – Englisch

bitmark:
[.cloze:bitmark--]
[@id:218101]
[%Nr. 3616]
[!Schreibe die kompletten Wortgruppen in das Simple Past.]

0. I listen → [_I listened][@example]
1. I play - [_I played]
2. we visit - [_we visited]
3. they like - [_they liked]
4. she dances - [_she danced]
5. you carry - [_you carried]
6. he stops - [_he stopped]
7. you change - [_you changed]
8. we enjoy - [_we enjoyed]
9. she uses - [_she used]
10. you try - [_you tried]

bit.instruction: Schreibe die kompletten Wortgruppen in das Simple Past.

bitmark:
[.cloze:bitmark--]
[@id:218153]
[%Nr. 3618]
[!Schreibe die kompletten Wortgruppen noch einmal im Simple Past.]

0. she invents → [_she invented][@example]
1. we wash → [_we washed]
2. I arrive → [_I arrived]
3. they destroy → [_they destroyed]
4. you hurry → [_you hurried]
5. she elects → [_she elected]
6. you marry → [_you married]
7. we plan → [_we planned]
8. he discovers → [_he discovered]
9. they travel → [_they travelled]
10. I prefer → [_I preferred]

bit.instruction: Schreibe die kompletten Wortgruppen noch einmal im Simple Past.

bitmark:
[.cloze:bitmark--]
[@id:218102]
[%Nr. 3614]
[!Schreibe die fehlenden Wortgruppen in die Lücken.
Verwende **nur die Langform** des Hilfsverbs (have/has)]

0. she invents → [_she invented][@example]
1. [_I play] -  I played - [_I have played]
2. [_she listens] - [_she listened] - she has listened
3. you work - [_you worked] - [_you have worked]
4. [_Andrew cleans] Andrew cleaned - [_Andrew has cleaned]
5. we count - [_we counted] - [_we have counted]
6. [_I help] - [_I helped ] - I have helped
7. the boys live - [_the boys lived] - [_the boys have lived]
8. [_he watches] - [_he watched] - he has watched
9. [_they start] - they started - [_they have started]
10. Susan looks - [_Susan looked] - [_Susan has looked]

bit.instruction:
Schreibe die fehlenden Wortgruppen in die Lücken.
Verwende **nur die Langform** des Hilfsverbs (have/has)

bitmark:
[.cloze:bitmark--]
[@id:218103]
[%Nr. 3620]
[!Setze die fehlenden Wortgruppen in die Lücken ein. Benutze **British English.** Achte auf die richtige Schreibweise und vergiss das jeweilige Personalpronomen nicht.
Verwende KEINE Kurzformen.]

**Simple Present**
[_they spray]
**Simple Past**
they sprayed
**Present Perfect**
[_they have sprayed]

**Simple Present**
[_you phone]
**Simple Past**
you phoned
**Present Perfect**
[_you have phoned]

**Simple Present**
[_we change]
**Simple Past**
[_we changed]
**Present Perfect**
we have changed

**Simple Present**
[_we travel]
**Simple Past**
[_we travelled]
**Present Perfect**
we have travelled

**Simple Present**
[_we control]
**Simple Past**
[_we controlled]
**Present Perfect**
we have controlled

**Simple Present**
[_we nod]
**Simple Past**
[_we nodded]
**Present Perfect**
we have nodded

**Simple Present**
[_she wastes]
**Simple Past**
[_she wasted]
**Present Perfect**
she has wasted

**Simple Present**
[_she washes]
**Simple Past**
she washed
**Present Perfect**
[_she has washed]

**Simple Present**
[_she smokes]
**Simple Past**
she smoked
**Present Perfect**
[_she has smoked]

**Simple Present**
[_they try]
**Simple Past**
[_they tried]
**Present Perfect**
they have tried

bitmark:
[.cloze:bitmark--]
[@id:218104]
[%Nr. 3610]
[!Es ist ein **regelmäßiges** Verb in jeder Reihe versteckt. Finde es heraus und schreibe es in die Lücke.]

0. say, lose, dance, sing → [_dance][@example]
1. read, feel, play, see - [_play]
2. listen, do, go, make - [_listen]
3. know, help, say, think - [_help]
4. like, write, forget, eat - [_like]
5. take, bring, cut, clean - [_clean]
6. watch, be, have, meet - [_watch]
7. put, buy, cook, teach - [_cook]
8. catch, find, answer, lose - [_answer]
9. want, tell, win, sit - [_want]
10. sell, build, drink, open - [_open]

bit.instruction: Es ist ein **regelmäßiges** Verb in jeder Reihe versteckt. Finde es heraus und schreibe es in die Lücke.

bitmark:
[.cloze:bitmark--]
[@id:218105]
[%Nr. 3612]
[!Es ist ein **regelmäßiges** Verb in jeder Reihe versteckt. Finde es heraus und schreibe es in die Lücke.]

0. swim, collect, tear, rise → [_collect][@example]
1. understand, drive, feed, check - [_check]
2. fly, plan, shake, begin - [_plan]
3. hit, love, hurt, lead - [_love]
4. happen, run, pay , wear - [_happen]
5. stick, grow, look, speak - [_look]
6. beat , send, leave , cry - [_cry]
7. break, live, cost, hear - [_live]
8. lie, throw, shine, stop - [_stop]
9. sink, mean, choose, borrow - [_borrow]
10. collect, freeze, ring, shut - [_collect]

bit.instruction: Es ist ein **regelmäßiges** Verb in jeder Reihe versteckt. Finde es heraus und schreibe es in die Lücke.

[-3. Spalte]

bit.instruction: Setze die fehlenden Wörter in die Lücken ein.

bitmark:
[.cloze:bitmark--]
[@id:218124]
[%Nr. 3674]
[!Schreibe alle 3 Formen der unregelmäßigen Verben in die Lücken.]

0. geben = [_give][@example] → [_gave][@example] → [_given][@example]
1. gehen = [_go] - [_went] - [_gone]
2. sagen = [_say] - [_said] - [_said]
3. tun, machen = [_do] - [_did] - [_done]
4. kommen = [_come] - [_came] - [_come]
5. haben = [_have] - [_had] - [_had]
6. stehen = [_stand] - [_stood] - [_stood]
7. machen = [_make] - [_made] - [_made]
8. kaufen = [_buy] - [_bought] - [_bought]
9. sitzen = [_sit] - [_sat] - [_sat]
10. schwimmen = [_swim] - [_swam] - [_swum]
11. sprechen = [_speak] -[_spoke] - [_spoken]
12. sehen = [_see] - [_saw] - [_seen]
13. singen = [_sing] - [_sang] - [_sung]
14. rennen = [_run] - [_ran] - [_run]
15. schreiben = [_write] - [_wrote] - [_written]

bit.instruction: Schreibe alle 3 Formen der unregelmäßigen Verben in die Lücken.

bitmark:
[.cloze:bitmark--]
[@id:218125]
[%Nr. 3676]
[!Schreibe alle 3 Formen der unregelmäßigen Verben in die Lücken.]

0. kommen = [_come][@example] → [_came][@example] → [_come][@example]
1. beginnen, anfangen = [_begin] - [_began] - [_begun]
2. fühlen = [_feel] - [_felt] - [_felt]
3. bekommen, holen = [_get] - [_got] - [_got]
4. zeichnen = [_draw] - [_drew] - [_drawn]
5. herbringen = [_bring] - [_brought] - [_brought]
6. wissen, kennen = [_know] - [_knew] - [_known]
7. wegbringen = [_take] - [_took] - [_taken]
8. bezahlen = [_pay] - [_paid] - [_paid]
9. treffen = [_meet] - [_met] - [_met]
10. verlassen = [_leave] - [_left] - [_left]
11. aufwachen = [_wake up] -[_woke up] - [_woken up]
12. lesen = [_read] - [_read] - [_read]
13. schlafen = [_sleep] - [_slept] - [_slept]
14. reiten = [_ride] - [_rode] - [_ridden]
15. bauen = [_build] - [_built] - [_built]

bit.instruction: Schreibe alle 3 Formen der unregelmäßigen Verben in die Lücken.

bitmark:
[.cloze:bitmark--]
[@id:218126]
[%Nr. 3678]
[!Schreibe alle 3 Formen der englischen unregelmäßigen Verben in die Lücken.]
